title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: The All types dialog in JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (e.g. a, a1, b, c, d) which should not be displayed. They should be less prominent.
OB: The All types dialog in JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (e.g. a, a1, b, c, d) which are currently being shown.
EB: The All types dialog in JDK 1.4 should not display obfuscated classes (e.g. a, a1, b, c, d).
SR:
Options:
 a) Sort class names in the All types dialog, placing lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter.
 b) Filter out obfuscated classes completely.
 I suggest implementing option a).
